mapper.insert: insert into tb_evaluate_suggest(username, school, suggest, star, create_time, update_time) values (#{username},#{school},#{suggest},#{star},now(),now())
mapper.select: select id,username,school,suggest,star,create_time,update_time from tb_evaluate_suggest where star>=4 order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update tb_evaluate_suggest set suggest=#{suggest} where id=#{id}
